Author: sherman
Content: Managing your time is important, but might be even more important to know how to manage it yourself.  It's better to have the skill of knowing how to prioritize things than to just listen to what someone else says.  Of course you can share your priorities with others to see if they are in line with project goals.

Author: Tichy
Content:
So the value of a service on the internet is solely to be derived from it's suitability to deliver advertisements to it's users? I think not...

As for the casinos, it was obvious from the start that they would be shut down eventually. \n

Author: davidw
Content:
A good book that I read that actually talks about the mental processes involved in attempting to create something innovative is this:

http://www.squeezedbooks.com/book/show/5/lateral-marketing-n...

It takes you through cataloging the 'dimensions' of an existing product, then changing one or more radically, and going back to look and see if it could make sense. It's an interesting mental exercise, if nothing else.
